item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description:
Bug fixes

  • Reduced tracking latency in The Unspoken (#480)
  • Fixed Oculus Games not starting correctly from the Revive Dashboard (#402, #478, #499)
  • Fixed Ultrawings being stuck on "Waiting for controller" (#508)
  • Fixed patching not working with the Steam version of Robinson: The Journey (#489)
  • Added an option to ignore the headset proximity sensor (#376)
